description: Why spend hours in the kitchen when you could be tucking into this Cheat's cordon bleu chicken recipe that's ready to eat in 20 minutes?
name: Cheat's Cordon Bleu Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup shredded mozzarella, cheddar & parmesan blend
0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in an ovenproof frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook chicken for 5 minutes, turning halfway through cooking.
Top each schnitzel with ham and 1/4 cup cheese. Bake for 10 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and cheese has melted.
Meanwhile, heat mash according to packet instructions. Divide mash, schnitzels and beans among plates. Serve scattered with parsley.
